# Group Products

## Product [/products/{id}]

### Remove Product [DELETE]

Permanently removes a product.

+ Headers

            {{headers 'session'}}

+ Response 200

  + Body

            {{example 'product'}}

  + Schema

            {{example 'product'}}

### Update Product [PUT]

Updates a a product.

+ Headers

            {{headers 'session'}}

+ Response 200

  + Body

            {{example 'product'}}
